faq.ques: Who can participate?
faq.ans: Anyone and everyone who is even remotely interested in fashion can participate. If you have the dream to be in the limelight for your style, but you have held yourself back because of your own constraints, worry not. You could be of any age or gender and still be crowned as a Hipi Stunner. If you are under 18 then parental/guardian approval is needed.

faq.ques: Do I need to be a trained fashion professional to participate?
faq.ans: No, not all. You could be a teacher or a bartender, a homemaker or a working professional, a college student or retired! If you enjoy fashion, you can participate.

faq.ques: I am married. Am I still eligible to participate?
faq.ans: Yes, you are! We have no restrictions based on martial status.

faq.ques: Do I need to buy a lot of new clothes to win?
faq.ans: No! All the challenges designed for Hipi Stunner can be successfully done with the existing clothes in your wardrobe. It depends on your creativity, on how you utilize the pieces to express yourself.

faq.ques: Can I make DIY outfits for the challenges?
faq.ans: Definitely yes! Anything that you feel amplifies your style and celebrates your uniqueness is very welcome.

faq.ques: If I have many looks for a challenge, what can I do?
faq.ans: You can make separate videos and upload them on the Hipi app. You’ll be selected based on the engagement of your videos, so, the more, the merrier!

faq.ques: Are there any restrictions in the way we style ourselves?
faq.ans: No restrictions! Whatever sails in your boat, sails in ours. You can be true to yourself and express your style however you want to – in fact, it’s one of the things that we’re looking for in the winner, a Hipi Stunner.

faq.ques: Can I mix different styles, like western with ethic?
faq.ans: Yes! Our challenges will expect you to experiment with various styles and tastes. This will in return help you find your personal fashion sense while having a lot of fun!

faq.ques: Are Haul fashion videos accepted?
faq.ans: No. We don’t have a ‘Haul Challenge’ either. This pageant is strictly challenge based and any entry that doesn’t fit in the criteria of the challenge will not be accepted for the contest.

faq.ques: How to open an Account on Hipi App?
faq.ans: Download Hipi app from Play Store or App Store. Sign up and you are good to go.

faq.ques: How long is the contest?
faq.ans: The contest is for 6 months, starting from 1st of August and ending on 31st Jan 2023

faq.ques: How many winners are there every month?
faq.ans: There will be one winner every month. Hence, a total of six winners in the duration of six months.

faq.ques: How many videos can I upload in one day?
faq.ans: As many as you want. But only the top video with the maximum engagement will be counted.

faq.ques: How are the winners chosen?
faq.ans: The decision throughout the 6 months will be taken by giving equal consideration to the engagement rate and judges' choice.

faq.ques: What is engagement Rate?
faq.ans: The addition of likes, views, follows, shares, downloads give us the engagement rate of the participant.

faq.ques: How many videos do I need to upload to be eligible for the contest?
faq.ans: Each month has two Hipi Stunner challenges. You need to upload at least one video for each challenge using #HipiStunner to be eligible for that month.

faq.ques: How will I get my cash prize?
faq.ans: Once the winner’s name is announced, our team will get in touch with you and will take all your details & start the process. Once the process starts it may take about a month for the cash prize to reach you.

faq.ques: Can I submit more than 1 entry?
faq.ans: We always welcome overachievers. While you can submit more than one entry for each challenge, only the video with the highest engagement rate will be counted.

faq.ques: Who can I reach out to if I have a query?
faq.ans: You can drop in your questions at stunner@hipi.co.in / send a WhatsApp message to +91 9966044412. You can also scroll down to the contact form below.

faq.ques: What are winners terms and conditions?
faq.ans: The winners would be bound by standard terms and conditions contract. If you seek more details please write to stunner@hipi.co.in
